testcase.classname: To verify facebook login with negative test cases
testcase.name: To validate login with invalid email format
testcase.system-out: When I enter "bharathi@com" in the email field..............................passed And I enter "ValidPassword123" in the password field........................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message "Invalid username or password"...........passed And To close the browser....................................................passed
